title: Google Meet Troubleshoot
description: Fix microphone, camera, and join issues on Google Meet.

steps.title: Check Browser Permissions
steps.instruction: Click the 'Lock' icon next to meet.google.com in the search bar. Ensure Camera and Microphone are set to 'Allow'.

steps.title: Verify Audio Settings in Meet
steps.instruction: In a Meet call: 3 dots → Settings → Audio. Ensure the correct Microphone and Speakers are selected.

steps.title: Test Camera in Another App
steps.instruction: Open your computer's 'Camera' app. If it works there but not in Meet, Chrome is being blocked by your Privacy settings.

steps.title: Lower Video Quality
steps.instruction: Settings → Video. Change 'Send resolution' and 'Receive resolution' to 360p to improve stability on weak connections.

steps.title: Clear Meet Cache
steps.instruction: If Meet won't load, clear data specifically for meet.google.com via Chrome Settings → Privacy → Site Settings.
